name: com.sidequest.banter
description: This Module contains the Banter SDK used for building spaces in the bantaverse.

samples.description:
Learn how to use Banter components in your spaces! Contains many worlds to explore.

1. Basics: Learn how to build Banter spaces.
2. Gadgets: Fun tools to add to your world!
3. Gravity Maze: An example space that manipulates gravity.
4. Networking: Learn how to use Banter networking components.
5. AI Builder: Generate dynamic images and models in Banter!
A physics-fuelled playground showcasing the best of our FlexaBody system.
